msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fix bug http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/SDK-20857 List is not responding to PgDn and PgUp
Implement page up/down support in vertical, horizontal and tile layouts.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Multiple selection and requiresSelection now work together.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
SDK-20892 - Using navigation keys don't work when the DropDownList is closed

The dataGroup skin part holds the layout value. The layout was null when the DropDownList was closed because the dataGroup only exists when the DropDownList is open. The fix is to override the layout getter and return VerticalLayout if the dataGroup doesn't exist.
SDK-20850 - DropDownList dispatches open event before dropDown is visible on screen
The skin update was changed from synchronous to asynchronous, so the open event was dispatched too early. We now wait for UPDATE_COMPLETE before sending the open or close events.
SDK-19874 - Setting selectedIndex on Spark DropDownList control doesnt auto-scroll dropdown
The skin update was changed from synchronous to asynchronous, so the dataGroup skin part didn't exist when we tried to auto-scroll. We now wait for UPDATE_COMPLETE before auto-scrolling.
SDK-20810 - DropDownList does not display color style correctly when set to white

The labelElement was getting colorized to the baseColor. The DropDownListSkin has been changed to subclass Skin instead of SparkSkin. There are no visuals in the DropDownListSkin that need any of the SparkSkin functionality.
SDK-20870 - Changing Spark DropDownList skin at runtime clears the DropDownList Button label
In partAdded, when the labelElement is added, we now update the labelElement with the selectedItem's text representation
QE Notes: Fix for SDK-20850 should resolve the image snapshot problem when writing DDL mustella tests.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
DropDownList, DropDownController and PopUpAnchor API Changes
- Changed open/close events from type mx.events.DropdownEvent to spark.events.DropDownEvent
- Changed dropDownController from public to protected
- Changed systemManager_mouseDownHandler argument from type MouseEvent to type Event
- Only add the popUp to the PopUpManager if the PopUpAnchor is attached to the stage
- Fixed sizing of the popUp by setting the width/height instead of calling setActualSize
- Only apply transform changes to the popUp if it is currently displayed
- Applied API updates to VideoPlayer sub-components and skins
- Fixed bug in SkinnableComponent when setting a skinPart to null
- Replaced List.list_keyDownHandler with inherited keyDownHandler function
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

We now use the bottleneck method, updateRenderer() to let the DataGroup have first crack at setting a renderer's data, owner and labelText properties. Then the "true" owners like a List or ButtonBar which father a renderer, get a chance to come in and clean out stale properties and set new properties on the renderer (which was either created anew or recycled).
I also cleaned up some comments in LayoutBase.
Mustella: Steve and Ella ok'ed a cyclone I gave them against List, ButtonBar, DataGroup and SkinnableDataContainer.
